on reading compounds: 浴衣【ユカタ】yukata (light cotton kimono worn in the summer or used as a bathrobe)
開浴【カイヨク】bathing (in a Zen Temple)
泥浴【デイヨク】mud bath, balneum coenosum
kun reading compounds: 浴びる【あびる】to dash over oneself (e.g. water), to take (e.g. shower), to bask in (e.g. the sun), to bathe in, to be flooded with (e.g. light), to be covered in, to suffer (e.g. an attack), to draw (e.g. criticism, attention, praise), to have heaped upon, to be showered with
浴びせる【あびせる】to pour on
